name: Husk Demon
description: The Husk Demon is a Medium fiend with a chaotic and destructive nature, equipped with the ability to fly and slip through narrow spaces.
memorable: Its life-draining abilities allow it to weaken foes while restoring its own vitality, making it a formidable opponent.
goals: To drain life from foes and spread despair through its presence.
relations: Often encounters other demons, represents a chaotic force in the hierarchy of fiends.
environment: Typically found in dark, chaotic areas, especially in places influenced by demonic entities.
strengths: High mobility and life-draining capabilities, along with resistance to multiple damage types.
weaknesses: Below-average physical prowess in Strength, Intelligence, and Charisma limits its effectiveness in certain situations.
attacks: Multiattack capability with Life Drain, dealing slashing and necrotic damage while regaining hit points.
most_powerful_ability: Soul Feed, allowing it to debilitate enemies by draining their happiness, hope, or motivation.
senses: Darkvision allows it to see in dim light as if it were bright light.
skills: Notably adept at stealth, enabling it to remain undetected.
additional_information: Has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
Can slip through spaces as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.
Immunities to poison and the poisoned condition.
Can weaken enemies with disadvantage effects on attacks or saves.
Life Drain can permanently reduce a target's hit point maximum.
test_queries: fiend that drains life and hopes
demon that flies and inflicts despair
demon capable of slipping through narrow spaces
